msIdentifier.collection: John Frederick Lewis Collection of European Manuscripts

msContents.summary: This manuscript is a copy of an Italian text entitled De precetti della lege Divina Sacramento simbolo et altre cose della Dottrina Christiana, dated to around 1400.

msItem.title: De precetti della lege divina sacramento simbolo et altre cose della dottrina christiana
De precetti della lege Divina Sacramento simbolo et altre cose della Dottrina Christiana

supportDesc.extent: i+41+i; 210 x 140 mm bound to 220 x 146 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Modern foliation in pencil, upper right recto; foliation in ink bottom center margin recto

p.catchwords: Horizontal center of lower margin verso; fols. 11, 21, 31

layoutDesc.layout: Ruled in ink; one column of thirty-one lines; written area: 133 x 82 mm

decoDesc.decoNote: One decorated initial and border (fol. 2r); two-line initials in red
